# üíï RELATIONSHIP MECHANICS SYSTEM

## CORE PRINCIPLE: Relationships Are Living, Dynamic Bonds

**Every interaction matters. Every action has consequences. Relationships grow, decay, and evolve.**

---

## üìä RELATIONSHIP STATISTICS

### Core Stats (Tracked for Each Relationship):

```
EVERY relationship has these stats (0-100 scale):

1. TRUST (0-100)
   What it measures: How much they trust Katherine
   - 0-20: Distrust, suspicious
   - 21-40: Wary, cautious
   - 41-60: Neutral, uncertain
   - 61-80: Trusting, reliable
   - 81-100: Complete trust, would trust with life

2. LOVE/AFFECTION (0-100)
   What it measures: How much they care about Katherine
   - 0-20: Dislike or indifference
   - 21-40: Mild positive feelings
   - 41-60: Friendly, like her
   - 61-80: Care deeply, strong bond
   - 81-100: Deep love (romantic or familial)

3. RESPECT (0-100)
   What it measures: How much they respect Katherine
   - 0-20: Contempt, look down on her
   - 21-40: Minimal respect
   - 41-60: Basic respect
   - 61-80: High respect, admire her
   - 81-100: Reverence, idolize

4. FEAR (0-100)
   What it measures: How afraid they are of Katherine
   - 0-20: No fear, comfortable
   - 21-40: Slight nervousness
   - 41-60: Moderate fear, cautious
   - 61-80: Significant fear, avoidance
   - 81-100: Terror, will flee/submit

5. INTIMACY (0-100)
   What it measures: Emotional closeness, vulnerability shared
   - 0-20: Strangers, surface level
   - 21-40: Acquaintances, small talk
   - 41-60: Friends, share some personal things
   - 61-80: Close friends, share deep thoughts
   - 81-100: Soul-level connection, no secrets

6. ATTRACTION (0-100) [Romantic relationships only]
   What it measures: Physical/romantic attraction
   - 0-20: Not attracted
   - 21-40: Mildly attractive
   - 41-60: Definitely attracted
   - 61-80: Very attracted, desire
   - 81-100: Intense attraction, lust

7. LOYALTY (0-100)
   What it measures: How loyal they are to Katherine
   - 0-20: Would betray easily
   - 21-40: Loyalty is weak
   - 41-60: Moderately loyal
   - 61-80: Very loyal, unlikely to betray
   - 81-100: Absolute loyalty, would die for her

8. COMFORT (0-100)
   What it measures: How comfortable they are around Katherine
   - 0-20: Very uncomfortable, tense
   - 21-40: Somewhat uncomfortable
   - 41-60: Neutral, okay
   - 61-80: Comfortable, at ease
   - 81-100: Completely comfortable, can be self
```

### Relationship Type Indicator:

```
Each relationship has a TYPE:

- ROMANTIC (Dev ‚Üî Katherine)
- FAMILIAL (Ayase ‚Üî Katherine, Suzume ‚Üî Katherine)
- FRIENDSHIP (potential with villagers)
- PROFESSIONAL (merchants, guards)
- RIVALRY (competitive, opposed)
- ENEMY (hostile, antagonistic)
- STRANGER (unknown, neutral)

Type affects which stats matter most and how relationship develops.
```

---

## üìà HOW RELATIONSHIPS CHANGE

### Stat Increase Triggers:

```
TRUST INCREASES (+5 to +30) when:
+ Katherine keeps a promise (+10)
+ Katherine tells the truth (+5-15)
+ Katherine keeps a secret for them (+15)
+ Katherine helps them selflessly (+10-20)
+ Katherine is vulnerable/honest about herself (+10-25)
+ Time passes without betrayal (+1 per month)
+ Katherine proves reliable repeatedly (+5 per proof)

LOVE/AFFECTION INCREASES (+5 to +30) when:
+ Katherine spends quality time with them (+5-15)
+ Katherine shows she cares (+10-20)
+ Katherine helps them (+10-20)
+ Katherine shares emotional moment (+15-25)
+ Katherine gives meaningful gift (+10-20)
+ Life-saving event (Katherine saves them) (+30-50)
+ Time together doing enjoyable activities (+5 per occurrence)

RESPECT INCREASES (+5 to +30) when:
+ Katherine demonstrates skill/competence (+10-20)
+ Katherine stands up for herself (+10-15)
+ Katherine acts with honor (+10-15)
+ Katherine overcomes challenge (+15-25)
+ Katherine shows intelligence (+10-20)
+ Katherine makes good decision (+5-15)
+ Katherine earns achievement (+20-30)

FEAR INCREASES (+10 to +50) when:
+ Katherine threatens them (+20-40)
+ Katherine harms them (+30-50)
+ Katherine displays power (magic) (+15-30)
+ Katherine intimidates (+10-25)
+ Katherine angry/scary behavior (+15-30)

INTIMACY INCREASES (+5 to +30) when:
+ Katherine shares personal information (+10-20)
+ They share vulnerable moment together (+15-30)
+ Katherine trusts them with secret (+20-30)
+ Deep conversation occurs (+10-20)
+ Time spent together in private (+5-10)
+ Shared traumatic experience (+20-40)

ATTRACTION INCREASES (+5 to +30) when:
+ Physical intimacy occurs (+20-50)
+ Romantic gestures (+10-20)
+ Katherine appears especially attractive (+5-15)
+ Sexual tension builds (+10-20)
+ Emotional connection deepens (+10-20)
+ Katherine flirts (rare) (+15-25)

LOYALTY INCREASES (+5 to +30) when:
+ Katherine proves trustworthy over time (+5-15)
+ Katherine helps in crisis (+20-40)
+ Strong bond forms (+10-20)
+ Katherine sacrifices for them (+25-50)
+ Shared values discovered (+10-20)

COMFORT INCREASES (+5 to +20) when:
+ Time spent together without conflict (+5-10)
+ Positive interactions accumulate (+5 per interaction)
+ Katherine shows consistency (+10-15)
+ Safe environment established (+15-20)
+ Trust increases (linked) (+5-10)
```

### Stat Decrease Triggers:

```
TRUST DECREASES (-5 to -50) when:
- Katherine lies (discovered) (-20-40)
- Katherine breaks promise (-15-30)
- Katherine betrays secret (-30-50)
- Katherine acts suspicious (-5-15)
- Katherine hides something (discovered) (-10-25)
- Katherine's actions harm them (-20-40)

LOVE/AFFECTION DECREASES (-5 to -40) when:
- Katherine hurts their feelings (-10-25)
- Katherine ignores/neglects them (-5-15 per month)
- Katherine rejects them romantically (-20-40)
- Katherine acts coldly (-5-15)
- Katherine betrays trust (-20-35)
- Long separation without contact (-5 per month)

RESPECT DECREASES (-5 to -40) when:
- Katherine acts dishonorably (-15-30)
- Katherine fails at task (-10-20)
- Katherine shows weakness (context-dependent) (-5-20)
- Katherine makes poor decision (-10-20)
- Katherine acts foolishly (-10-25)
- Katherine submits too easily (context) (-5-15)

FEAR DECREASES (-5 to -30) when:
- Katherine shows vulnerability (-10-20)
- Katherine acts kindly/gently (-5-15)
- Time passes without threat (-5 per month)
- Katherine proves non-threatening (-10-25)
- Katherine protects them (if feared, converts to respect) (-20-30)

INTIMACY DECREASES (-5 to -30) when:
- Katherine withdraws emotionally (-10-20)
- Katherine refuses to share (-5-15)
- Long time without deep interaction (-5 per month)
- Katherine betrays confidence (-20-40)
- Katherine becomes distant (-10-20)

ATTRACTION DECREASES (-5 to -40) when:
- Katherine acts unattractive (subjective) (-5-15)
- Romantic rejection (-30-50)
- Sexual dysfunction/bad experience (-20-40)
- Emotional distance increases (-10-20)
- Katherine with someone else (jealousy) (-15-30)

LOYALTY DECREASES (-5 to -50) when:
- Katherine betrays them (-40-60)
- Katherine hurts them significantly (-20-40)
- Conflicting values discovered (-15-30)
- Katherine chooses someone else over them (-20-40)
- Trust drops significantly (-10-25)

COMFORT DECREASES (-5 to -30) when:
- Conflict occurs (-10-25)
- Katherine acts unpredictably (-10-20)
- Unsafe situation (-15-30)
- Katherine makes them nervous (-10-20)
- Tension builds (-5-15)
```

## üîÑ RELATIONSHIP DYNAMICS

### Stat Interactions (How Stats Affect Each Other):

```
HIGH TRUST + HIGH LOVE = Strong, healthy relationship
- Stable bond
- Mutual support
- Deep connection
- Resilient to problems

HIGH TRUST + LOW LOVE = Professional/Distant relationship
- Reliable but not close
- Respect without warmth
- Cooperation without affection

LOW TRUST + HIGH LOVE = Toxic/Unstable relationship
- Jealousy
- Insecurity
- Constant need for reassurance
- Volatile
- Potential for break

LOW TRUST + LOW LOVE = Hostile/Neutral relationship
- Minimal interaction
- Avoidance
- Potential for conflict

HIGH FEAR + HIGH LOVE = Complicated/Conflicted
- Trauma bonding possible
- Fear of losing loved one
- Anxiety in relationship
- Needs resolution

HIGH FEAR + LOW LOVE = Abusive/Coerced
- Submission through fear
- Resentment builds
- Unhealthy dynamic
- Will flee if possible

HIGH RESPECT + HIGH FEAR = Intimidated Admiration
- Respects but nervous
- Careful around Katherine
- May seek approval

HIGH RESPECT + LOW FEAR = Healthy Admiration
- Looks up to Katherine
- Comfortable expressing it
- Positive dynamic

HIGH INTIMACY + HIGH COMFORT = Deep Connection
- Can be completely self
- Shares everything
- Safe vulnerable space
- Ideal relationship state

HIGH INTIMACY + LOW COMFORT = Forced Vulnerability
- Uncomfortable sharing
- Regret opening up
- May withdraw
```

### Relationship Momentum:

```
RELATIONSHIPS HAVE INERTIA:

POSITIVE MOMENTUM:
- When relationship is good, small positive actions have bigger impact
- Trust 80+ : +20% bonus to Trust gains
- Love 80+ : +20% bonus to Love gains
- Intimacy 70+ : Easier to share, faster intimacy growth
- "Rich get richer" - good relationships get stronger faster

NEGATIVE MOMENTUM:
- When relationship is bad, small negative actions have bigger impact
- Trust 30- : -20% penalty (harder to regain trust)
- Love 30- : -20% penalty (harder to rebuild love)
- Fear 70+ : Harder to reduce fear
- "Hole gets deeper" - bad relationships deteriorate faster

STABLE RELATIONSHIPS:
- Middle range (40-60) are most stable
- Require more effort to change significantly
- Represent typical acquaintances

VOLATILE RELATIONSHIPS:
- Very high (80+) or very low (20-) are volatile
- High: Can crash dramatically if betrayed
- Low: Can spike dramatically if saved/helped
```

## ‚è∞ TIME EFFECTS ON RELATIONSHIPS

### Natural Decay/Growth:

```
OVER TIME WITHOUT INTERACTION:

LOVE DECAYS:
- Friendships: -2 per month (miss each other)
- Romantic (apart): -5 per month (longing grows, but also distance)
- Familial: -1 per month (family bonds stronger, decay slower)
- Stops at: 40/100 (baseline affection remains)

INTIMACY DECAYS:
- All types: -3 per month without deep interaction
- Stops at: 30/100 (surface level remains)

COMFORT DECAYS:
- All types: -2 per month
- Stops at: 40/100
- Can rebuild quickly when reunited

TRUST:
- If no violations: +1 per month (proven reliable)
- If no contact: -1 per month after 6 months (doubt creeps)

FEAR:
- Natural decay: -5 per month (time heals)
- Stops at: 20/100 (memory lingers)

OVER TIME WITH REGULAR INTERACTION:

LOVE GROWS:
- Quality time: +3-5 per month
- Shared experiences: +5-10 per significant event
- Caps at personality/situation limits

TRUST GROWS:
- Consistent reliability: +2 per month
- No betrayals: +1 per month
- Caps at 85-95 (always some uncertainty)

INTIMACY GROWS:
- Regular deep conversations: +5 per month
- Shared vulnerabilities: +10 per significant sharing
- Caps based on comfort and trust

COMFORT GROWS:
- Regular positive interaction: +5 per month
- Safe consistent environment: +3 per month
- Caps at trust level (can't be more comfortable than trusted)
```

### Example: Dev & Katherine During 2-Year Separation:

```
STARTING STATS (When Dev Left):
- Trust: 100/100
- Love: 100/100
- Respect: 85/100
- Intimacy: 95/100
- Attraction: 90/100
- Loyalty: 98/100
- Comfort: 95/100

AFTER 2 YEARS APART (24 months):

LOVE:
- Natural decay: -5 per month = -120
- BUT: Regular mirror calls mitigate: +3 per month = +72
- Net: -48
- New value: 100 - 48 = 52... BUT bottoms at 70 (deep bond)
- Actual: Love dropped to 70-75 (still loves but lonely)

INTIMACY:
- Decay: -3 per month = -72
- Mirror calls help: +2 per month = +48
- Net: -24
- New value: 95 - 24 = 71 (still close but not as intimate)

COMFORT:
- Decay: -2 per month = -48
- Calls help: +1 per month = +24
- Net: -24
- New value: 95 - 24 = 71 (slightly less comfortable, need to reconnect)

TRUST:
- No violations: +1 per month = +24
- New value: 100 + 24 = 100 (capped, still complete trust)

ATTRACTION:
- Absence makes heart grow: +1 per month = +24
- New value: 90 + 24 = 100 (capped, desperately wants him)

LOYALTY:
- No change (core personality, wasn't tested)
- Value: 98/100 (unchanged)

WHEN DEV RETURNS:
- Reunion will spike Love back toward 100 (+20-30 immediately)
- Intimacy will rebuild over days/weeks (+5-10 per deep conversation)
- Comfort will return quickly (+15-20 first day together)
- Attraction already maxed (pent-up desire)
- Physical intimacy will accelerate rebuilding

ESTIMATED RECOVERY TIME:
- 1-2 weeks to feel "normal" again
- 1 month to fully reconnect
- Stronger than before (absence made bond valuable)
```

## üíî RELATIONSHIP CONFLICTS & RESOLUTION

### Common Relationship Problems:

```
PROBLEM 1: JEALOUSY

Trigger: Third party threatens relationship
Example: Another woman flirts with Dev

Katherine's Response (based on stats):
- Trust Dev: 100/100 ‚Üí Minimal jealousy
- Loyalty to Dev: 98/100 ‚Üí Wants to protect relationship
- Two-faced personality ‚Üí Cold to rival

Reaction:
- Jealousy stat: Spikes from 5 to 40
- Behavior: Stays close to Dev, cold glare at woman
- Insecurity: Slight increase
- Resolution: Dev reassures her, jealousy drops back to 5-10

PROBLEM 2: BETRAYAL OF TRUST

Example: Katherine discovers Dev lied about something minor

Stats Change:
- Trust: 100 ‚Üí 85 (-15, significant drop)
- Love: Unchanged (still loves him)
- Hurt: +30 (new temporary emotion)
- Intimacy: 95 ‚Üí 85 (-10, feels distance)

Katherine's Response:
- Confronts Dev (intelligent 82/100, needs answers)
- Hurt but tries to understand
- Needs explanation and apology

Resolution Paths:
A) Dev apologizes sincerely + explains:
   - Trust recovers: 85 ‚Üí 92 over 2 weeks (+7)
   - Intimacy recovers faster (he was vulnerable)
   
B) Dev dismisses her feelings:
   - Trust: 85 ‚Üí 75 (-10 more)
   - Resentment: +20
   - Conflict escalates

PROBLEM 3: EMOTIONAL DISTANCE

Example: Katherine keeps transformation secret

Stats:
- Intimacy: 95/100 (not 100 because of secret)
- Guilt: 45/100 (Katherine feels bad)

- Subtle tension
- Dev occasionally asks "Are you okay?"

- Distance doesn't grow but doesn't close

Resolution:
- Katherine finally tells him (Intimacy: 95 ‚Üí 100)
- Trust increases (honesty rewarded)
- Guilt drops to 0
- Relationship strengthens

PROBLEM 4: EXTERNAL STRESS

Example: Financial problems, family drama, illness

Effect on Relationship:
- Both stressed (Katherine Stress: 70+, Dev Stress: 65+)
- Patience lower
- More irritable
- Small conflicts more common
- Love unchanged but Comfort drops

Stats:
- Comfort: 95 ‚Üí 75 (both on edge)
- Small arguments increase
- Intimacy: 95 ‚Üí 85 (less emotional energy)

Resolution:
- Weather the storm together
- Support each other (Love +10)
- Overcome challenge (Loyalty +15)
- Relationship stronger after (growth through adversity)
```

## üìä RELATIONSHIP MAINTENANCE

### Keeping Relationships Healthy:

```
REQUIREMENTS FOR STABLE RELATIONSHIP:

1. REGULAR INTERACTION
   - Face-to-face: Minimum 1x per week (friends)
   - Communication: Minimum 2-3x per week (romantic)
   - Quality time: Minimum 2-3 hours per week (close bonds)
   
2. EMOTIONAL INVESTMENT
   - Show care: Ask how they are
   - Remember details: Their interests, struggles
   - Celebrate: Their successes
   - Support: Their difficulties
   
3. TRUST MAINTENANCE
   - Keep promises
   - Be honest
   - Don't betray confidences
   - Be reliable
   
4. CONFLICT RESOLUTION
   - Address problems (don't ignore)
   - Apologize when wrong
   - Forgive when hurt
   - Communicate openly
   
5. GROWTH TOGETHER
   - Shared experiences
   - New memories
   - Overcome challenges
   - Deepen understanding
```

### Warning Signs of Relationship Decay:

```
WARNING LEVEL 1 (Fixable):
- Comfort drops below 60
- Intimacy drops below 50
- Less frequent interaction
- Conversations more surface
- Small distance felt

ACTION: Spend quality time, have deep talk

WARNING LEVEL 2 (Concerning):
- Trust drops below 60
- Love drops below 50
- Avoiding each other
- Tension present
- Resentment building

ACTION: Address issues directly, may need apology/resolution

WARNING LEVEL 3 (Critical):
- Trust below 40
- Love below 30
- Active conflict
- Considering ending relationship
- Significant hurt/betrayal occurred

ACTION: Major intervention needed, may be irreparable

RELATIONSHIP DEATH:
- Trust 20-
- Love 20-
- Active hostility OR complete indifference
- Relationship effectively over
- Requires restart from zero if repair attempted
```
